Texts.Eng: No indication was given as to what exactly that meant, but if Tiss is involved there is most certainly death following not far behind her. And that's just one agent. Undoubtedly our 'benign' leadership has seen to it that we have dozens active at any point, and it is my personal belief that they are attempting to strengthen the League for open hostilities with

We prefer to remain isolated whenever possible, away from the prying eyes of other species. At least, that was my understanding of things. The Council, unfortunately, appears to have other plans for the galaxy. Just last week I received word that Veilak Tiss (yes, the assassin responsible for Gressvels demise) was being activated to help with matters directly.

the forces of the Protectorate now that they are at their weakest. A homeworld -obliterated-, and our council wants to attack them after such a tragedy? Unthinkable. They should instead remember what happened to *our* world after an invasion. I cannot stand this scum any longer. You can bet that they have waited centuries to play this card, and the time is ripe.
